subdialogue_text: Ah-hah, Unkindled are we?
Welcome to my abode.
I am Cornyx, an old pyromancer.
A crow in his cage, as you see, now.
But here we are, an encounter for the ages!
I hear the Unkindled make for fine vessels.
Care to learn some pyromancies from this old man?

behavior: #0Talk-1st time if chosen the Pyromancer class
subdialogue_text: Ah-hah, Unkindled are we?

behavior: #0Talk-1st time if chosen the Pyromancer class
subdialogue_text: Welcome to my abode.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time if chosen the Pyromancer class
subdialogue_text: I am Cornyx, an old pyromancer.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time if chosen the Pyromancer class
subdialogue_text: A crow in his cage, as you see, now.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time if chosen the Pyromancer class
subdialogue_text: But here we are, an encounter for the ages!

behavior: #0Talk-1st time if chosen the Pyromancer class
#0Talk-1st time if chosen the Pyromancer class
subdialogue_text: I hear the Unkindled make for fine vessels.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time if chosen the Pyromancer class
subdialogue_text: You've been dabbling in pyromancies, it seems?

behavior: #0Talk-1st time if chosen the Pyromancer class
subdialogue_text: Well then, care to learn some pyromancies from this old man?

Most foolish.
This old crow has a little knowledge of his own, you know.
Bah. No sense in spelling it out.
I will not rush you. You will return, once you are enlightened.

We are, after all, both Undead.
And both prisoners, in our own ways.
Well, hello, That was certainly quick.
Are you any more enlightened on this occasion?

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after choosing "Decline", after the protagonist leaves & returns
subdialogue_text: Well, hello. You certainly took your time.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after choosing "Decline", after the protagonist leaves & returns
subdialogue_text: Are you any more enlightened on this occasion?

behavior: #0Choose "Ask to learn pyromancy" to either the 1st or 2nd query
#0Choose "Ask to learn pyromancy" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: Most wise. A chance encounter should not be squandered.

behavior: #0Choose "Ask to learn pyromancy" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: To reiterate, I am Cornyx, of the Great Swamp.

behavior: #0Choose "Ask to learn pyromancy" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: The pleasure is mine.

behavior: #0Choose "Ask to learn pyromancy" to either the 1st or 2nd query

subdialogue_text: What are you doing?
Little bird, what's to be gained?
Ahh, there you are, Unkindled One.
I wish to express my gratitude.

For trusting a lowly pyromancer,
and allowing me to gaze upon this majestic flame.
As promised, I will impart pyromancies to you.
But first, you'll need a flame of your own.
Careful you don't burn yourself with it.
Ahh, there you are, Unkindled One.
I am pleased to have a pupil as dedicated as you.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" 1st time before giving him a Pyromancy Tome
subdialogue_text: To learn pyromancies, you must vow to become my pupil.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" 1st time before giving him a Pyromancy Tome
subdialogue_text:
I know, I know, but such is the way of the world.
Respect your elders, and so on.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" 1st time before giving him a Pyromancy Tome
subdialogue_text: And pyromancy, of course, is no exception.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" 1st time before giving him a Pyromancy Tome
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 2nd time before giving him a Pyromancy Tome
subdialogue_text:
Oh, we'll need a pyromancy tome
to learn more advanced pyromancies.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" 2nd time before giving him a Pyromancy Tome
subdialogue_text:
Though unorthodox,
that would be the most expedient way to make progress.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" 2nd time before giving him a Pyromancy Tome
subdialogue_text:
If this were the Great Swamp, and you had the luxury of time,
we could have trained you the hard way.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" 2nd time before giving him a Pyromancy Tome

subdialogue_text: Yes, here we are. It's been long indeed.
With this, I can teach you more sophisticated pyromancies.
Splendid. I can boast I am your tutor a little longer.
Well, well...I've never seen anything like this.
This inscription...this tome is from the Catacombs.
Fascinating. On this day, the teacher learns alongside the pupil.
Ah, what have we here! A pyromancy tome from Izalith!
Then you've found the home of pyromancy.
Brilliant. I will never curse being old and Undead again.
Now, now, show it here, quickly. Let us channel them together.
The primal pyromancies known only to old Master Salaman!
Ahh, what have we here...

By the gods. This inscription reads Quelana,
the ancient deity, one of the witches of Izalith...

The last of them, who wandered the lands.
Then she must have returned to Izalith, after all.
But I regret to say, I cannot accept this.

Quelana's pyromancies are for witches,
and must be learned from a mistress.
But thank you, for allowing me to peer upon such a thing.
If only I were a woman.
I'm afraid I cannot accept this.

This pyromancy tome is dark, and delves into the depths of men,
where an untouchable flame resides.

I cannot comprehend this myself,
let alone teach it to you.

It is a spell forbidden in the Great Swamp,
and nearly everywhere else, too.

Only one terribly afflicted, or burdened by deep sorrow,
could begin to understand this.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after giving him the Great Swamp Pyromancy Tome
subdialogue_text: If you seek pyromancy tomes, take this sage advice.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after giving him the Great Swamp Pyromancy Tome
subdialogue_text: The lands of the Lords converge upon Lothric.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after giving him the Great Swamp Pyromancy Tome
subdialogue_text: The home of pyromancies drifts comparatively close, as well.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after giving him the Great Swamp Pyromancy Tome
subdialogue_text: At least, that is what pyromancers of the Great Swamp believe.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after giving him the Great Swamp Pyromancy Tome
subdialogue_text:
The place is called Izalith.
Oh, how I wish to behold a primal pyromancy.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after giving him the Great Swamp Pyromancy Tome
subdialogue_text:
Well, these are old tales.
No one knows where the truth begins, or ends.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after giving him the Great Swamp Pyromancy Tome
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" after giving him the Carthus Pyromancy Tome
subdialogue_text: Ahh, you found this tome in the Catacombs...

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after giving him the Carthus Pyromancy Tome
subdialogue_text: This spell is akin to chaos.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after giving him the Carthus Pyromancy Tome
subdialogue_text: It may even serve as a link to Izalith, home of pyromancies...

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after giving him the Izalith Pyromancy Tome
subdialogue_text: Heed my words, Unkindled One.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after giving him the Izalith Pyromancy Tome
subdialogue_text: Fear the fire.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after giving him the Izalith Pyromancy Tome
subdialogue_text:
The home of pyromancy, Izalith,
was scorched by the very fire it created.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after giving him the Izalith Pyromancy Tome
subdialogue_text: Undoubtedly, it was a flame of chaos, tangled by a witch's hand.

behavior: #0Menu-Choose "Talk" after giving him the Izalith Pyromancy Tome
subdialogue_text: But who's to say that this Bonfire's flame is any different?
Do not be gone for long.
What is a teacher without a pupil?
Why? What's the matter?
Stop this, stop this at once!
Fine, fine, I see how it is.
When a pupil strays from the path, the master must intrude.
Prepare yourself, hatchling.
Behold, the pyromancy of an old crow!
Spare the rod and spoil the child...
I can't complain... This old reverie...had to end...
##Cease this foolishness.
##Hah hah hah hah!
##Oh, the eternal folly of youth...
